issue.title: [R] Consistently use "getOption" to set nightly repo
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16594](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16594). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
In `install_arrow` the nightly repo url is set via `getOption("arrow.dev_repo", "https;//...")`
this should also be the case in `winlibs.R` and `nixlibs.R`
